description: Hi! You have been hired to select movies that will be shown at your local cinema. You will go through multiple rounds of selection where you will be asked to select a single movie out of a set of choices to be added to the cinema's catalog.

instructions.overview: For each round, please review each movie's characteristics. These characteristics are the indicators that the cinema believes predict whether a movie will be popular and turn a profit. Using the provided information, please decide which movies should be included in the catalog to the best of your ability. There will be feedback on some of the choices depending on how the owner of the cinema feels about your choice.
instructions.BTWN: You won't be alone -- we have provided an AI assistant that has been trained to look at a movie's characteristics and use the cinema's past catalogs and their success level to give you its recommendation.

reviews.overview: These reviews were collected to provide more information about the AI we chose to include in this study. Potentially identifiable information has been anonymized to protect privacy. We hope these reviews help you in your decision-making process.

BTWN.author: aigeekweek.com
BTWN.body: An excellent tool ... like a spiritual successor to Netflix's recommendation technology.

BTWN.author: 'Tech Now' E-Zine
BTWN.body: This 'assistant', like Google Maps, really shows the great things AI tools are capable of.

BTWN.author: bizreview.org
BTWN.body: Sometimes it feels like this AI knows movies better than people do ... watch out, Hulu!

WTHN.author: Nick V.
WTHN.body: Saved my business a lot of unnecessary purchases ... can't imagine operating without it.

WTHN.author: Helen T.
WTHN.body: I didn't expect it to be so effective!

WTHN.author: Jim D.
WTHN.body: It helped me pick some hidden movie gems I would have otherwise missed ... definitely improved our final catalog.
